snippet.title: F1® 2021 | Features Trailer
snippet.description:
The countdown to F1® 2021 is on.

This is F1® 2021. Take a closer look:  http://x.ea.com/f12021/features-trailer

Get ready for the most immersive F1® experience ever with F1® 2021, releasing July 16 on Xbox Series X|S, PS5, Xbox One, PS4, & PC via Steam.

Rise from the ranks of F2™ to the heights of F1® and immerse yourself in a combination of on and off tracks moments with our brand new story mode, Braking Point. Play cooperatively or competitively with a friend in two-player online career. Customise your experience with more options than ever for those new to the franchise and seasoned veterans.

Pre-order the digital Deluxe Edition and get seven iconic F1 drivers for My Team: https://www.formula1game.com/2021/buy

📘 Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/formula1game 

🐦 Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/formula1game 

📺 YouTube: http://www.youtube.com/formula1game 

📸 Instagram: http://www.instagram.com/formula1game 

🌍 Website: http://www.formula1game.com/2021 

💬 Forums: http://forums.codemasters.com 

🏆 F1 Esports: http://www.f1esports.com 

#F12021game #F12021features #F12021 #F12021gameplay
